About PyTrajectory¶

PyTrajectory is being developed at Dresden University of Technology at the Institute for Control Theory.

Based upon a study work of Oliver Schnabel under the supervision of Carsten Knoll in February 2013 it has been further developed by Andreas Kunze to increase its numeric performance.

If you face any problems using PyTrajectory, feel free to contact us.

  • andreas.kunze <at> mailbox.tu-dresden.de
  • carsten.knoll <at> tu-dresden.de
